comment._content: Another of the witnesses called before the Commission on Industrial Relations (Walsh Commission) for their January, 1915 hearings at New York's City Hall. His testimony is at: www.archive.org/stream/industrialrelati08unitrich#page/79... He was the president of Harvard for 40 years, retiring in 1909. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_William_Eliot
